entry.title: Estimating Likelihood for Lightning Payments to be (in)feasible
entry.summary: It appears that there is a misunderstanding in providing a detailed summary as the original context or email content you are referring to has not been provided. Without specific content from an email or a detailed message to summarize, I'm unable to generate a blog post following your guidelines. Please provide the content or the key points from the email you would like summarized into a blog post format, adhering to the rules you've specified.
